name: Sniffer Dog Agent: Help Border Patrol Agency USBP
name_original: Sniffer Dog Agent: Help Border Patrol Agency USBP
description:
Control the border checkpoints of your country, where criminals try to sneak in and out. they try to smuggle drugs and weapons. they try to traffic illegals. Sniff every vehicle for possible crimes and criminals and chase them out.
Missions are designed by keep in mind the criminals activity happening on border check points. As the Border patrol police dog, with police its also your duty to keep the borders safe. Keep patrolling different border check posts and sniff out the criminals.


Top Features.

. Ideal border check posts
. Sniffer dogs to chose from
. Number of challenging missions
. Chase and catch simulation game play
. More missions will be coming soon
